body_html:

But I got the last error
`
1>------ Build started: Project: tf_core_kernels, Configuration: Debug x64 ------

...

1>tf_core_kernels.dir\Debug\tf_core_kernels.lib : fatal error LNK1248: image size (1017EA054) exceeds maximum allowable size (FFFFFFFF)
`
How can I build it?
